page.title: 05TWO HOUSES IN HEDGE END
page.content:
The cheapest house in Hedge End in June 1985 cost Â£29,000. It is a two bedroomed terrace house. It includes an entrance hall,lounge,kitchen/dining room,bathroom and car standing space. It has a small garden to the front and back.Rateable Value Â£161.00 Rates payable Â£240.66
The most expensive house for sale cost Â£78,950 - described as a 'substantial detached chalet bungalow'.It comprises of an entrance porch,entrance lounge,kitchen/breakfast room,dining room,rear lobby,cloakroom,spacious landing,three bedrooms,bathroom,third of an acre of grounds,heated swimming pool,double garage,and hardstanding for cars. Rateable value - Â£302,00 Rates payable-Â£410.56 Average House prices:- Â£57,000 Cheapest House :- Â£16,000
